thread.title: Insomniac Announces On Sale Date For 4th Annual Electric Daisy Carnival, UK
thread.title_full: Insomniac Announces On Sale Date For 4th Annual Electric Daisy Carnival, UK - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Insomniac Announces On Sale Date For 4th Annual Electric Daisy Carnival, UK
text:
Insomniac
Early Owl On Sale Begins At 10:00 GMT On Monday November 2, 2015 At UK.ElectricDaisyCarnival.com
EDC UK Returns to Milton Keynes Bowl July 9, 2016
LOS ANGELES , Oct. 26, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Today, Insomniac and local partner Festival Republic announced that tickets for the 4 th annual Electric Daisy Carnival, UK go on sale Monday, November 2 . Fans who sign up for the exclusive pre-sale here , will get the first chance to secure their passes on Friday, October 30 . Last year, tens of thousands of fans flocked to Milton Keynes Bowl to witness performances from over 30 of dance music's top international artists across three monumental stages, including the iconic kineticCATHEDRAL.
Insomniac and Festival Republic will transport the unparalleled production features and magical atmosphere of North America's largest dance music festival across the pond. EDC UK promises colourful costumed performers, exhilarating carnival rides and innovative art for fans to enjoy. The gorgeous greenery of the historic Milton Keynes will set a picturesque backdrop for the festival while legendary DJs bring their cutting-edge sounds to the massive stages.
Early Owl General Admission and VIP tickets go on sale at 10:00 am GMT on Monday, November 2 , available on Ticketmaster . This year's VIP area will offer a plethora of exclusive attractions alongside mind-blowing production and the ultimate dance line up. VIP ticket holders will have unprecedented access to the VIP Village alongside exclusive fast track entry, a cocktail and champagne bar, and a private pamper parlour. Fans who register for the exclusive pre-sale here will have access to tickets at 10:00 am GMT on Friday, October 30 .
EDC UK is for fans 18 years and older. For more updates and announcements, please visit UK.ElectricDaisyCarnival.com and follow on Facebook , Twitter , and Instagram .
For more information and to stay up to date with the latest Insomniac news, visit www.insomniac.com .
About Insomniac:
Insomniac produces some of the most innovative, immersive music festivals and events in the world. Enhanced by state-of-the-art lighting, pyrotechnics and sound design, large-scale art installations, theatrical performers and next generation special effects, these events captivate the senses and inspire a unique level of fan interaction. The quality of the experience is the company's top priority.
Throughout its 20-year history, Insomniac has produced more than 250 festivals, concerts and club nights for nearly 5 million attendees in California , Colorado , Florida , Nevada , New York , Texas , Puerto Rico , and the United Kingdom . The company's premier annual event, Electric Daisy Carnival Las Vegas, is the largest multi-day music festival in North America , and attracted more than 400,000 fans over three days in June 2015 .
The company was founded by Pasquale Rotella , and has been based in Los Angeles since it was formed in 1993.
Keep up with Insomniac announcements and news on Insomniac.com , Facebook and Twitter .
